title: How to Overcome Worry and Fear. Ft Sarah Partain
description:
“Don’t worry. It'll be fine.” Yeah, it's easier said than done. Here's how Jeanine and Sarah deal with their worries and fears in a healthy way.

Want to send Jeanine a message?

You can do that here: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy by clicking "Message."

Support our podcast!

Visit: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy and click "Support!"

Follow us on Instagram!

Happy and Healthy: https://www.instagram.com/HappyandHealthyPodcast/

Jeanine: https://www.instagram.com/jeanineamapola/

Sarah: https://instagram.com/sarah_partain?utm_medium=copy_link

Follow us on TikTok!

Happy and Healthy: https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMRktmycQ/

Jeanine: https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMRktnchb/

You can WATCH this episode here: https://youtu.be/3oDcYBufaVE 

You can also listen to the audio form on Spotify, Apple Podcast, Google Podcast, Overcast, Anchor, Breaker, Pocket Casts, and Radio Public.
